extendedInfo.description: Mahjong Deluxe is a free mahjong game based on a classic Chinese game.(also known as Shanghai Mahjong, Taipei Mahjong, Kyodai, Mahjong Trails, or Shanghai mahjongg)The goal is to remove all tiles from the board. You may remove only paired free tiles. The tile is free when there are no tiles either to the left or to the right from it. If you cannot find any pairs you may shuffle the tiles at any times, but you will get a time penalty.Features - 100 board layouts. - 15 backgrounds. - 5 tile art.- Shuffle- Hint- Undo - Auto save - Block shadow - Auto zoom inEnjoy!

reviews.title: Lovely game, enjoyed from the very first game, many thanks
reviews.comment: Very nicegame and very user friendly
reviews.author: Judy Marshall

reviews.title: OK so far......
reviews.comment: I\'ve only played a few games and I like the layout, colours, graphics etc. However I\'d really like to be able to turn the \'hints\' off so I can use my brain to figure out matches rather than them jump out at me. I can see that there will be no real challenge there after a few games. Can I turn off this feature?
reviews.author: Vicki Grierson

reviews.title: I give your game TEN stars!!
reviews.comment: The graphics... the music... Everything about your game  Is perfect. Good job!
reviews.author: Connie Jeanine

reviews.comment: I Really like this game. Free is great. Lots of choices & easy to see on my cell phone!  Thanks

reviews.title: Exciting Game!
reviews.comment: I love this game! My dad got me hook on this game when I was younger, he taught me how to play this game! And known I have a new phone to be able to down load free apps etc. I first download this game! I freaking love it! Awesome and relaxing game!

reviews.title: Mahjong!!!
reviews.comment: Nothing beats this game for relaxing me. I got my Mom hooked when we were room mates. Now when she comes for dinner I find her on my tablet !!! My children will hide my tablet when they come to visit LOL !!!

reviews.title: It is excellent!

reviews.title: Love this layout.
reviews.comment: I do enjoy this version of the game. Easily read tiles, backgrounds are very appealing. I would recommend this game. I do not like \'Amazon\' advertisement flashing in lower left corner. Very annoying. Constantly tapping on it. What, if anything, will make it disappear.
reviews.author: Beth Verneris

reviews.comment: Love all the layouts. More than other games I\'ve played. Glad there is the undo for when I mess up. Wish the game iption page was larger. I had to get my magnifying glass out to see some of the options. Game is very addicting.\tLove the game. Lots of layouts; more than other games I\'ve played. Very addicting. I do wish the option page was larger. I had to get my magnifying glass out to see the options.
reviews.author: Merry Lassa

reviews.title: Can\'t be installed on SD card
reviews.comment: This game runs well on my device.  Unlike other Mahjong apps, it seems to pick up my taps on the desired tiles fairly well, despite their small size on my phone\'s display.  But, I have a major issue with its inability to install to the SD card.  For this, I am dropping my rating way down to two stars.  In my opinion, any app that is over 3M or 4M should be movable to the SD card.  This app weighs in at a whopping 34.16M when installed.  This capability should have been designed into the app from the very beginning.
